Us and Our Services:

Us

Here at Salon Inana, we create classic or fashionable hairstyles with solid professionalism. Haircuts, coloring and hairstyles are carried out listening to your wishes into practical, easy-care and good-looking hair ensembles. With a steady hand, we also carry out beard styling, special hair and scalp treatments, and permanent eyelash and eyebrow coloring.

While waiting Dr. Pepper is all about those cuddles.

Our services are listed as below.

Color Services

We color your hair according to your wishes and our color services bring life and naturalness to your hair. The latest color technologies we use enable your hair to have a shiny and natural end result. If you wish, you can give your hair a personal and trendy coloring with bold color choices or a refreshing style change to match the color of your skin and eyes. However, we always pay attention to the condition of the hair before color treatment, and color treatment is not always possible. Color work can also be done with, for example, different stripes, sliding and gloss dyeing.

Please note that we follow the cosmetics industry's recommendation not to dye the hair of children under 16 years of age, and we also dye responsibly, taking into account the health and safety of the customer.

Hair Cutting

Well-cut hair is easy to care for, resistant to growth and wears the features of its wearer in style. The hairstyles are shaped according to the hair quality and home care habits, so that the haircut looks beautiful both on weekday mornings and during festive moments.

You can choose a 45-min haircut or a 60-min haircut, depending on whether you need a clean-up cut or change the style of your hair with a model change cut.

Hair Care Treatments

Healthy hair is today, and the journey towards the hair of your dreams should start with a special hair treatment that will give you joy and good hair days for a long time.

The versatile care treatments performed in our stores adhere to the inner layers of the hair and remain long-lasting in the hair, facilitating home care for up to several weeks. With a special treatment, it is possible to strengthen the hair quality, smooth out frizz, calm natural curls, fix the color for a longer period of time or make the base airy. We also treat various scalp symptoms, from psoriasis to excessive greasiness.

All care treatments include a relaxing scalp massage, which you can choose every time in connection with laundry services if you wish. You can also book a double appointment and enjoy a scalp massage for 10 minutes!
